amendment.description: Amendment requires the EPA to establish a program for awarding grants on a competitive basis to public agencies and entities for fleet modernization programs including installation of retrofit technologies for diesel trucks.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in House Report 109-49 to create a Diesel Truck Retrofit and Fleet Modernization Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
